hero.title: Bufo Alvarius Ceremonies
hero.subtitle: Die Before You Die
hero.description1: The most potent and profound entheogenic compound on Earth.
hero.description2: Sacred passage to ego dissolution and divine remembrance.

what.title: What is Bufo Alvarius?
what.subtitle: 5-MeO-DMT from the Sonoran Desert Toad
what.p1: Bufo Alvarius—5-MeO-DMT—is the only substance that can reliably introduce individuals to a state of full non-dual awareness, override the energetic structure of the ego, and reveal the unitary nature of reality.
what.p2: This is not a psychedelic. It is a sacred teacher of death and pure remembrance. It is not for everyone, and it is not a shortcut.

experience.title: The Experience
experience.speedValue: Effects begin within seconds of inhalation
experience.intensityValue: Complete ego dissolution and non-dual consciousness
experience.outcomeValue: The remembrance of what you've always been

what.quote: This is not an offering we promote publicly. If you are here, you've been guided, invited, or felt the call. This path requires humility, surrender, and integration.

location.title: Location
location.description: A sacred container in nature, held with deep reverence

timeline.title: Timeline
timeline.includes: Includes opening prayer, ceremony, and post-ceremony rest

whatsIncluded.title: What's Included
whatsIncluded.item3: Bufo ceremony with full energetic holding
whatsIncluded.item5: Full day of care and post-ceremony rest

requirements.title: Sacred Requirements
requirements.description: This ceremony is only offered after completion of 1-2 preparation sessions and mutual discernment between facilitator and participant. Medical screening is mandatory.

ceremonySpace.quote: Sacred container held with reverence and deep presence

isThisForYou.title: Is This Medicine For You?

for.title: This work is FOR:
for.item1: Those ready to die before they die
for.item2: Those who've done deep inner work and feel called to complete something
for.item3: Those seeking death of illusion, not an experience
for.item4: Those ready to meet resistance, ego, attachments and let them go
for.item5: Those ready to surrender and integrate
for.item7: Those who can no longer pretend

notFor.title: This work is NOT for:
notFor.item1: Those with untreated trauma or psychosis
notFor.item4: Anyone who refuses to integrate or slow down

isThisForYou.quote: You're not broken. You're not lost. You're initiating.

medical.title: Medical Screening Required
medical.description: Safety is paramount. All participants must complete a thorough health questionnaire and medical screening before ceremony. This work is not suitable for everyone.

contraindications.title: Contraindications
contraindications.item5: Severe unresolved trauma without therapeutic support

disclaimer.title: Medical Disclaimer:
disclaimer.text: All services are complementary and do not replace medical, psychological, or psychiatric care. This is sacred medicine work, not medical treatment. If you have any medical conditions, please consult with your healthcare provider before applying.

investment.title: Investment

ceremony.title: Bufo Alvarius Ceremony
ceremony.item2: Full ceremony with energetic holding (2-4 people max)

complete.title: Complete Journey Investment
complete.description: The full sacred journey includes Preparation + Ceremony + Integration:
complete.total: Total investment typically ranges €500-800+ depending on preparation and integration needs

investment.accessibility: Sliding scale available | BIPOC and single parent discounts | Payment plans offered
investment.quote: No one is ever turned away for lack of funds when the call is genuine.

application.title: The Application Process
application.quote: This work is never sold. Only offered.
application.description: This is an invitation to discernment—for both of us. Not everyone is a fit. And that's sacred.

steps.title: Steps:
steps.step1: Fill out private application (reviewed in deep presence)
steps.step4: Only after preparation: Agree on ceremony dates
